creditline: Bequest from the Karen Daniels Petersen American Indian Collection
description: outline of flowers on scrolling stem in multicolored beads on black velvet; blue gingham backing
text:
The manufactured materials that are used in this moccasin cuff are the materials that are used in a lot of later art.  The cuff is an example of the transition from the use of natural materials to the use of manufactured materials.

--Anthony White


This moccasin cuff is in its initial stages. The beaded outline defines the design which is later filled in with different colors.

--Andrea Carlson
title: Moccasin Cuff
